document_data.name: '''Cutlass'''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cutlasses''''' were a type of a short and heavy [[sword]].
document_data.Description: ''Cutlasses'' had slightly curved blades that could either be used in a stabbing or slashing manner. They had heavy basket hilts, making it is more difficult for the wielder of a cutlass to be disarmed.

Notable Owners.Individuals: ''Cutlasses'' were often considered a favored weapon of the god [[Valkur]].
Notable Owners.Groups: ''Cutlasses'' were known to be especially popular among pirates.
